events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position submitted on our careers portal. Our team will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a developer role based on your resume and the position you applied for.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case. They will be reaching out shortly to guide you through the upcoming screening and interview process.
Your initial screening call with our engineering team went very well. They appreciated your knowledge of software development and problem-solving approach.
Thank you for promptly responding to our scheduling request. We appreciate your enthusiasm and timely communication during this recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 11:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly, focusing on the software engineering challenges outlined in the job description.
